name: Coline Donon
goal:
I offer to my clients advise and support in monitoring and advocacy campaigns at EU level.

Main areas of expertise are: Food and Agricultural products, Consumer policy, Products Safety, and Internal Market.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Enterprise, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
